title: Create a ConfigMap
description: Create a ConfigMap named ||app-config|| with key ||'database_url'|| and value ||'mysql://localhost:3306/mydb'|| in the ||neptune|| namespace.

validations.description: ConfigMap should exist in saturn namespace

validations.command: kubectl get configmap app-config -n neptune -o jsonpath='{.data.database_url}'
validations.description: ConfigMap should contain correct database_url value
